miro_stereo_adaptor Documentation

miro_stereo_adaptor

The subpub package

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/miro_stereo_adaptor

miro_stereo_adaptor

Acts as Adaptor for data publised by MIRO_mdk over ROS_Master, making it synchronized and available for furthur processing, especially for stereo vision purposes.
